document.full_text: it is modern economics, not ethics, that are bringing change to the semi-nomadic roma, who in the early 21st century are among the few in europe hewing to ancient ways.
document.title: the female factor: subtle shift at the gypsy bride market
lines_and_colors: it is modern economics, not ethics, that are bringing change to the semi-nomadic roma, who in the early 21st century are among the few in europe hewing to ancient ways.
